FAIL_TO_PASS: when showHelpAfterError() and error and then shows full help
when program has subcommands then has automatic help command
when argument has choices and default then both included in helpInformation
when add no visible command with heading then heading does not appear
when argument described then included in helpInformation
when specify --help then exit
when argument described with default then included in helpInformation
when add custom help command then custom help command
when helpOption has just custom short flag then custom short flag invokes help
when command sets hidden then not displayed in helpInformation
when .helpCommand(name) then help command in group
when command sets deprecated noHelp then not displayed in helpInformation
when arguments described in deprecated way and empty description then arguments still included in helpInformation
when .helpCommand(true) then help command in group
when "program help" then program
when program has required option not specified and --help then help
when helpOption has just custom long flag then custom long flag invokes help
when program has required option not specified and subcommand --help then help
when addCommand with hidden:true then not displayed in helpInformation
when default command and "program help" then program
